Horse Power Pavilion – Coffee Shop | Bistro | Weddings | Events | Accomodation – On of the best destinations in Florida for Weddings, Dining, Accommodation & Open Air Events 4497 State Highway 20 W, Freeport, FL 32439 +1 850 520 1737 info@horsepowerpavilion.co.uk Follow Us Home About Accommodation Location & Map Pavilion Our Team Amenities All Activities Kick Ass Coffee Fish & Chips Hungry Heifer Smoked Meats Hamilton’s Bistro Holland Cottage Experiences Car Shows Hairy Hogg Brewery Weddings News Gallery Contact Menu Welcome to Horse Power Pavilion COFFEE SHOP • BISTRO • BREWERY • WEDDING & EVENTS VENUE • ACCOMMODATION Discover More Food & Drink Great Food, Great Atmosphere Everything From English Fish & Chip Stalls To Smoked Meats Discover More Hairy Hogg Brewery & Bar - Fully Stocked At The Horse Power Pavilion Discover More Eat Drink And Be Merry WELCOME TO HORSE POWER PAVILION Everything from Food to Live Entertainment piece of paradise at this very special estate and ranch is an exquisite main house and separate bunk house are set on nearly 39 acres of natural beauty, including irrigated pasture land, lake/pond, mature trees, and creek access leading to Alaqua Bayou and the Choctawhatchee Bay (navigable by small boat)! We have over 36 Acres of glorious land set in the beautiful Walton County. Watch video Book your next adventure +1 850 520 1737 Your browser does not support the audio element. Event Types Choose your adventure Centre view At the Horse Power Pavilion, The Possibilities Are Endless There’s always something happening at the Horse Power Pavilion. From our growing food court and our outdoor bar area to performance car shows.  Why not bring all our catering, teepee and accommodation services together, and create the best wedding day ever! Events Live Music Car Shows Family Fun Days LEARN MORE Weddings Religious Ceremonies Civil Ceremony Same Sex Weddings LEARN MORE Accommodation 1 Bedroom Cottage Swimming Pool Free Wifi LEARN MORE Food & Drink Coffee Shop Smoked Meats Brewery/Bar Fish & Chips LEARN MORE 01 Hungry Heifer Smoked Meats 02 Car Shows 03 Kickass Coffee @ Hamilton's 04 Hairy Hogg Brewery activities There is Always  Something Happening At Horse Power Pavilion Set in the beautiful City of Freeport, Horse Power Pavilion is a 39 acre ranch dedicated to fun.  From the Hairy Hogg Brewery & Bar to Hamilton’s Bistro there is all the ingredients for a fun family day out.  Check out our list of services and activities below to see whats in stor on your next visit. Kick Ass Coffee @ Hamilton’s AngryAss Coffee servers some of the finest coffee and refreshments in Freeport. Made from an Arabica Aroma coffee bean, we offer a great selection of coffees and a wide variety of flavours.

Our customers agree, our iced café mocha are delicious! With friendly staff and a warm welcome, whether your trying to cool down, warn up or chill out, there is something for everyone's taste. Relaxing atmosphere - Best coffee - Popular with locals - Delicious pastries - Free Wi-Fi Monday Tuesday - Closed
Wednesday Thursday Friday 11am-9pm
Saturday 10am-10pm
Sunday 10am-7pm Bistro Hamilton's Bistro

We have created a stylish bistro within the heart of The Horse Power Pavilion.

Enjoy freshly prepared English bistro inspired cuisine. Whether it’s for a casual catch up over lunch, a special occasion, relaxed family meal or Sunday lunch, Hamilton's will be the perfect place to eat.

Open 7 days a week for lunch and dinner, we have something for everyone including gluten-free, vegan and vegetarian options. Click Here To View Our Menu Monday Tuesday - Closed
Wednesday Thursday Friday 11am-9pm
Saturday 10am-10pm
Sunday 10am-7pm Brewery Freeport's premier craft Homebrew Club and Brewery in the making.

Located within the gates of Horse Power Pavilion of Freeport. We are open to the public and everyone is welcome to attend our meetings and enjoy some great Homebrew!

Currently brewing: Hogg Wash Golden Horse Mucky Mare Friday, Saturday 4pm-9pm at the Pavilion 18+ Holland Cottage About this space Private 1 bedroom suite with large bathroom and open living space. Access to pool and fire pit areas set within 55 acres of the private 'Horse Power Pavilion" Ranch. Onsite coffee trailer yet only 20 minutes to the most beautiful beaches on the emerald coast. Water access for small boat or kayak. This suite has kitchenette area with microwave and fridge freezer. Ample parking and a real feel of peace and tranquility out in the countryside. Relax and unwind at our beautiful property. The space Access to the water. On site coffee shop. Further on site accommodations to really make this a family vacation.
BBQ trailer and beautiful coffee shop. 1 Queen bed and 1 sofa Check-in: After 14:00 Check out: 11:00 Free parking on-site Weddings Find your nearest high ropes adventure, that's ideal for you, today.

discover how we ensure our garden remains sustainable and organic. The group will be able to pick and eat some of our produce straight from the plants and also help with either harvesting or sewing crops as well.

Brand New Treetop Adventure+ just launched at Go Ape Bracknell and Go Ape Leeds Castle. Easy 1 - 5 hours 25 Fish & Chips Nestled within the vibrant and eclectic Horse Power Pavilion at a sprawling ranch in Destin, Florida, Nana Betties Fish and Chips trailer brings a slice of classic British cuisine to the sunny shores of the Gulf Coast. This quaint and charming food trailer, named with affection and nostalgia, evokes the comforting tastes of traditional English fish and chips, a beloved dish that has transcended borders and found fans worldwide.

Nana Betties is more than just a food trailer; it's a culinary experience steeped in tradition. The name itself conjures images of a beloved grandmother's kitchen, where recipes are passed down through generations and meals are prepared with love and care. The trailer's decor is quintessentially British, with Union Jack bunting and rustic wooden elements that add to its charm. The aroma of freshly fried fish and chips wafts through the air, drawing in locals and tourists alike who seek a taste of authentic British fare.

The menu at Nana Betties is simple yet meticulously crafted. The star of the show is the classic fish and chips – tender, flaky fish encased in a golden, crispy batter, served alongside thick-cut chips that are perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection. Each serving is accompanied by a wedge of lemon and a generous portion of tartar sauce, providing the perfect balance of flavors. For those looking to explore beyond the traditional, Nana Betties also offers variations such as battered sausages, mushy peas, and pickled onions, all staples of a British chippy.

What sets Nana Betties apart is not just its dedication to authenticity but also its commitment to quality. The fish is sourced fresh, and the batter is made using a secret family recipe that ensures a light yet crispy texture. The chips are hand-cut and double-fried to achieve the perfect crunch on the outside and a fluffy interior. This attention to detail has earned Nana Betties a loyal following and rave reviews from patrons who appreciate the genuine taste of England in the heart of Florida.

Located at the Horse Power Pavilion, a dynamic venue known for its blend of food, music, and community events, Nana Betties is a beloved fixture. The pavilion itself is a hub of activity, hosting everything from live music performances to farmers' markets, making it the perfect spot for a casual meal. Visitors can enjoy their fish and chips at picnic tables under the pavilion's shaded areas or take their meal to go and explore the beautiful ranch surroundings.

In essence, Nana Betties Fish and Chips trailer offers more than just a meal – it provides a nostalgic journey to the cobbled streets of England, where the simple pleasure of fish and chips is a cherished tradition. Whether you're a Brit longing for a taste of home or a curious foodie eager to try something new, Nana Betties at the Horse Power Pavilion in Destin promises an unforgettable culinary experience. Also homemade beer, fish and chips (British style), coffee, everything is delicious! Thank you Kate for making Freeport amazing! Mack Ream Freeport, FL I definitely recommend horse power pavilion.  The owners are incredibly kind and giving.  They treat everyone like family.  They definitely have our support.  They make a fantastic difference in our community. Homepage - HorsePower Brands® Our Brands Franchise Ownership HOWIE About Us News and Media Resources building people that build businesses At HorsePower Brands ® , we empower entrepreneurs to achieve their goals by simplifying business ownership. Our brands are built on the foundation of successful home service companies. We collect data at all points of the customer journey. This data is used to populate dashboards for our franchisee partners and drive our strategic decisions.
